name: Spider Go Splat!
description:
This is not really a game as there is just not much in terms of game play in it. This is more a tech demo showing the graphics quality I was able to achieve native on the Quest 2.

I started this project just to get familiar with the limitations on developing VR on Quest 2.  So my focus was on graphics and optimizing. I will more than likely add more gameplay features in time. 

I have allowed itch to collect donations so if you want to support my development adventures then please feel free to donate BUT it is not required to download this and check it out.

Thank You
"Prophet"
